hackathon-description-text: D&B will provide access to its trove of data through their API, as well a suite of partner data sets and API’s. We’re looking for a few great developers and designers to create innovative solutions that help our government prevent fraud and catch bad actors. We'll take over the sweet offices of Microsoft in Chevy Chase, MD for the weekend.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Deputy Director for the Center for Program Integrity at CMS

hackathon-description-header: A hackathon to help combat malfeasance and fight fraud waste and abuse in the public sector.
